resources.string: Search by case name or modules
Case 1. When you open this screen, the keyboard are immediately shown and EditText view below has focus. Use button on the right side to defocus view and hide keyboard

Case 2. Use Show button to show keybord, but EditText view on the center will not have focus. Use Hide button to hide keyboard. If EditText view will have focus and you will use Hide button, keyboard will be hidden, but EditText will have focus
